snippet: In the wake of two important Supreme Court rulings, the fight for equality continues.
abstract: Editorial contends Supreme Court's two decisions on same-sex marriage have served to emphasize lingering inequality for millions of gay and lesbian Americans who do not live in 13 states that allow same-sex marriage; warns that eliminating unfairness will require multi-pronged effort; details ways in which the fight for equality can move forward.
lead_paragraph: In the wake of two important Supreme Court rulings, the fight for equality continues.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
